long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to My Simple Recorder - G, your all-in-one solution for screen recording and file uploading. This Chrome extension allows you to effortlessly capture your screen and upload recordings directly to your Google Drive. Additionally, you can upload files from your computer or clipboard with ease.
